Home.search: Find a player (Steam ID/Steam profile link/your custom Steam URL) or add a match
Home.title: CS2 Statistics
Home.subtitle: Track your CS2 stats in competitive and Premier mode
Home.subtitle1: and earn skins for your skill

steamBot.title: Skins for
steamBot.description: Log into your account, and you can see,
steamBot.description1: what you can earn a skin for.

postMatchAdvancedStats.title: Post-Match Advanced Stats
postMatchAdvancedStats.description: After processing your match, check out our advanced CS2 stats on the dashboard. We have all the basic metrics, and you can also see who got the first frags, who traded beyond skins, and who was the clutch king!

roundByRoundMatchBreakdown.title: Round-by-Round Match Breakdown
roundByRoundMatchBreakdown.description: We provide detailed round data, such as how the round was won, whether there was a clutch, and a full list of kills. It’s perfect for finding that round where your friend died in the first 10 seconds!

automaticMatchTracking.title: Automatic Match Tracking
automaticMatchTracking.description: No need to add matches manually after they finish! Just sign in with Steam, add the game authentication code, and if a match is missing, we’ll automatically add all your new CS2 matches to help track your progress to Global Elite.

detailedMatchHistory.title: Detailed Match History
detailedMatchHistory.description: CS2 is a great game, but in-game you can only see the last 8 matches if you haven't downloaded the demo, which isn’t very convenient. We let you track your entire match history.

vacBanTracking.title: VAC Ban Tracking
vacBanTracking.description: We constantly check our database for VAC and Overwatch bans. When players get banned, you can see them on the 'Who You Played With' tab in your profile. There’s even a special filter to show only those players you played with who got banned.

trackPersonalProgress.title: Track Personal Progress
trackPersonalProgress.description: After 1000 hours of gameplay, you might want to see how much you've improved. Check out the graphs in your profile to evaluate your progress. Remember, when you rank up, your stats may temporarily drop, but once they start rising again, you might be ready for the next rank!

eseaIntegration.description: If you want to play against fewer cheaters but love our stats, we now also support ESEA match pages!

getStarted.title: Get Started Now
getStarted.description: Start tracking your CS2 stats right now – simply sign in with Steam below and we'll guide you through the next steps.

Second.pleaseRegister: Please register to see detailed information.

Footer.description: csstat.com is an online service for tracking CS2 stats. Start tracking your competitive CS2 match history now.
Footer.forFeedback: For feedback, contact us at: support@csstats.com
